content: Hi Folks - does anyone know if Cerner and Allscript's EHRs current versions are supporting any kind of services related to CDS hooks. I have a use case to implement that is a perfect scenario for cds hook instead of Smart app. Please let me know.
@Kevin Shekleton @Jeffrey Danford ?

@Shalinee Batri, you might want to be specific about exactly what hooks you're interested in. You might also talk offline with the vendors about what sites you're interested in. An EHR vendor supporting CDS Hooks doesn't necessarily mean they'll support your hook, nor that that capability will yet be rolled out to all of their sites...
Cerner doesn't have CDS Hooks support in production yet. I am not aware of any vendor with CDS Hooks support in production.
@Lloyd McKenzie that makes sense , thanks. @Kevin Shekleton Thanks Kevin .
Same for Allscripts. It's on our product roadmaps but not currently in production for any of our platforms.
@Jeffrey Danford Thanks for the info.
